verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou art my <S%H430>God;<s%> I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> Thee, I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thy <S%H8034>name;<s%> For Thou hast <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H6382>wonders,<s%> <S%H6098>Plans<s%> [formed] <S%H7350>long<s%> <S%H7350>ago,<s%> with <S%H544>perfect<s%> <S%H544>faithfulness.<s%>

For Thou hast <S%H7760>made<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> into a <S%H1530>heap,<s%> A <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> into a <S%H9281>ruin;<s%> A <S%H759>palace<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%> is a <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H4480>more,<s%> It will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1129>rebuilt.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> Thee; <S%H7151>Cities<s%> of <S%H6184>ruthless<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H3372>revere<s%> Thee.

For Thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H4581>defense<s%> for the <S%H1800>helpless,<s%> A <S%H4581>defense<s%> for the <S%H34>needy<s%> in his <S%H9496>distress,<s%> A <S%H4268>refuge<s%> from the <S%H2230>storm,<s%> a <S%H6738>shade<s%> from the <S%H2721>heat;<s%> For the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of the <S%H6184>ruthless<s%> Is like a [rain] <S%H2230>storm<s%> [against] a <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

Like <S%H2721>heat<s%> in <S%H6724>drought,<s%> Thou dost <S%H3665>subdue<s%> the <S%H7588>uproar<s%> of <S%H2114>aliens;<s%> [Like] <S%H2721>heat<s%> by the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of a <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> the <S%H2158>song<s%> of the <S%H6184>ruthless<s%> is <S%H6031>silenced.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H8081>lavish<s%> <S%H4960>banquet<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> A <S%H4960>banquet<s%> of <S%H8105>aged<s%> <S%H8105>wine,<s%> <S%H8081>choice<s%> pieces with <S%H9257>marrow,<s%> [And] <S%H2212>refined,<s%> <S%H8105>aged<s%> <S%H8105>wine.<s%>

And on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> He will <S%H1104>swallow<s%> up the <S%H6440>covering<s%> <S%H3875><s%> which is <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> Even the <S%H9276>veil<s%> which is <S%H5259>stretched<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

He will <S%H1104>swallow<s%> up <S%H4194>death<s%> for <S%H5331>all<s%> <S%H5331>time,<s%> And the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> will <S%H4229>wipe<s%> <S%H1832>tears<s%> <S%H4229>away<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6440>faces,<s%> And He will <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of His <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

And it will be <S%H559>said<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is our <S%H430>God<s%> for whom we have <S%H6960>waited<s%> that He might <S%H3467>save<s%> us. <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for whom we have <S%H6960>waited;<s%> Let us <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in His <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>"

For the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5117>rest<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> And <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will be <S%H1758>trodden<s%> <S%H1758>down<s%> in his <S%H8478>place<s%> As <S%H4963>straw<s%> is <S%H1758>trodden<s%> <S%H1758>down<s%> in the <S%H4325>water<s%> of a <S%H4087>manure<s%> <S%H4087>pile.<s%>

And he will <S%H6566>spread<s%> out his <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of it As a <S%H7811>swimmer<s%> <S%H6566>spreads<s%> out [his <S%H3027>hands<s%>] to <S%H7811>swim,<s%> But [the Lord] will <S%H8213>lay<s%> <S%H8213>low<s%> his <S%H1346>pride<s%> <S%H5973>together<s%> with the <S%H698>trickery<s%> of his hands.

And the <S%H4869>unassailable<s%> <S%H4013>fortifications<s%> of your <S%H2346>walls<s%> He will <S%H7817>bring<s%> <S%H7817>down,<s%> <S%H8213>Lay<s%> <S%H8213>low,<s%> [and] <S%H5060>cast<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
